quote: Life is a traveling to the edge of knowledge, then a leap taken.
author: D. H. Lawrence

quote: Be of good cheer about death, and know this of a truth, that no evil can happen to a good man, either in life or after death.
author: Socrates

quote: Life is much like going to the gym. The most painful part is deciding to go. Once you get past that, it's easy.
author: Robert Kiyosaki

quote: The tragedy of life doesn't lie in not reaching your goal. The tragedy lies in having no goals to reach.
author: Benjamin Mays

quote: Life becomes easier and more beautiful when we can see the good in other people.
author: Roy T. Bennett

quote: If life is a video game, the graphics are great, but the plot is confusing and the tutorial is way too long.
author: Elon Musk

quote: However difficult life may seem, there is always something you can do and succeed at.
author: Stephen Hawking

quote: Life is the art of drawing sufficient conclusions from insufficient premises.
author: Samuel Butler

quote: Contemplation often makes life miserable.  We should act more, think less, and stop watching ourselves live.
author: Nicolas Chamfort

quote: Only I can change my life. No one can do it for me.
author: Carol Burnett

quote: There is always room in your life for thinking bigger, pushing limits and imagining the impossible.
author: Tony Robbins

quote: The best thing to hold onto in life is each other.
author: Audrey Hepburn

quote: Giving is the secret of a healthy life. Not necessarily money, but whatever a person has of encouragement, sympathy and understanding.
author: John D. Rockefeller

quote: There are two primary choices in life: to accept conditions as they exist, or accept the responsibility for changing them.
author: Denis Waitley

quote: If he cannot stop the mind that seeks after fame and profit, he will spend his life without finding peace.
author: Dogen

quote: It's not the men in your life that matters, it's the life in your men.
author: Mae West

quote: Life is from the inside out. When you shift on the inside, life shifts on the outside.
author: Kamal Ravikant

quote: In the end, it's not the years in your life that count. It's the life in your years.
author: Abraham Lincoln

quote: In three words I can sum up everything I've learned about life: it goes on.
author: Robert Frost

quote: Optimism, when applied to your life, develops strength and peace within you.
author: Norman Vincent Peale

quote: No one can compete with you on being you. Most of life is a search for who and what needs you the most.
author: Naval Ravikant

quote: Life is not meant to be easy my child, but take courage: it can be delightful.
author: George Bernard Shaw

quote: In life you need either inspiration or desperation.
author: Tony Robbins

quote: The secret of life is to fall seven times and to get up eight times.
author: Paulo Coelho

quote: Choose a job you love, and you will never have to work a day in your life.
author: Confucius

quote: Don't let making a living prevent you from making a life.
author: John Wooden

quote: The man who asks a question is a fool for a minute, the man who does not ask is a fool for life.
author: Confucius

quote: Today I begin a new life. I will greet this day with love in my heart.
author: Og Mandino

quote: Life comes at us in waves. We can't predict or control those waves, but we can learn to surf.
author: Dan Millman

quote: Beginning today, treat everyone you meet as if they were going to be dead by midnight. Your life will never be the same again.
author: Og Mandino

quote: The meaning of life is just to be alive. It is so plain and so obvious and so simple.
author: Alan Watts

quote: The first thing you learn in life is you're a fool. The last thing you learn in life is you're the same fool.
author: Ray Bradbury

quote: The real meditation is how you live your life.
author: Jon Kabat

quote: Life is a journey, not a destination.
author: Dan Millman

quote: If you're brave enough to say goodbye, life will reward you with a new hello.
author: Paulo Coelho

quote: The significance of life is living.
author: Jiddu Krishnamurti

quote: Would you rather live your life according to the approval of others or aligned with your truth and your dreams?
author: Robin Sharma

quote: Don't live the same year 75 times and call it a life.
author: Robin Sharma

quote: Even when you think you have your life all mapped out, things happen that shape your destiny in ways you might never have imagined.
author: Deepak Chopra

quote: The more you praise and celebrate your life, the more there is in life to celebrate.
author: Oprah Winfrey

quote: Give a man a fish and you feed him for a day. Teach a man to fish and you feed him for a lifetime.
author: Lao Tzu

quote: It's better to dance than to march through life.
author: Yoko Ono

quote: Living a life that has a greater purpose and living up to it is the ultimate degree that we should strive for.
author: Gurbaksh Chahal

quote: Do every act of your life as if it were your last.
author: Marcus Aurelius

quote: Life is a gift. Never forget to enjoy and bask in every moment you are in.
author: Celestine Chua

quote: To some degree, you control your life by controlling your time.
author: Conrad Hilton

quote: Life is about accepting the challenges along the way, choosing to keep moving forward, and savoring the journey.
author: Roy T. Bennett

quote: Life and death are of supreme importance. Time swiftly passes by and opportunity is lost.
author: Dogen

quote: Think of yourself as dead. you have lived your life. Now, take what's left, and live it properly.
author: Marcus Aurelius

quote: The most important thing in life is to stop saying 'I wish' and start saying 'I will'. Consider nothing impossible, then treat possibilities as probabilities.
author: Charles Dickens
